serviceWorker.availableOffline: Timeline is now cached in your computer and you can use it offline. ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
serviceWorker.upgradePrompt: App is getting a new version!
serviceWorker.upgradeSuccess: Congratulations! App update succeeded! Still you can use it offline. ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
serviceWorker.externalActivatedPrompt: A new version of app is activated. Please refresh the page. Or it may be broken.

home.offlinePrompt: Oh oh, it seems you are offline. Here list some timelines cached locally. You can view them or click <1>here</1> to refresh.

createDialog.title: Create Timeline!
createDialog.name: Name
createDialog.nameFormat: Name must consist of only letter including non-English letter, digit, hyphen(-) and underline(_) and be no longer than 26.

timeline.messageCantSee: Sorry, you are not allowed to see this timeline.ðŸ˜…

visibilityTooltip.public: Everyone including those without accounts can see content of the timeline.
visibilityTooltip.register: Only those who have an account and logined can see content of the timeline.
visibilityTooltip.private: Only members of this timeline can see content of the timeline.

member.alreadyMember: The user is already a member.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Timeline
deleteDialog.inputPrompt: This is a dangerous action. If you are sure to delete timeline<1>{{name}}</1>, please input its name below and click confirm button.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete
deleteDialog.prompt: Are you sure to delete the post? This operation is not recoverable.

user.verifyTokenFailed: User login info is expired. Please login again!
user.verifyTokenFailedNetwork: Verifying user login info failed. Please check your network and refresh page!

login.alreadyLogin: Already login! Redirect to home page in 3s!

settings.languageSecondary: You language preference will be saved locally. Next time you visit this page, last language option will be used.
settings.gotoSelf: Click here to go to timeline of myself to change nickname and avatar.

dialogChangePassword.title: Change Password
dialogChangePassword.prompt: You are changing your password. You need to input the correct old password. After change, you need to login again and all old login will be invalid.

dialogConfirmLogout.title: Confirm Logout
dialogConfirmLogout.prompt: Are you sure to log out? All cached data in the browser will be deleted.

author.title: Site Developer
author.introductionContent: A programmer coding based on coincidence

site.title: Site Information
site.content: The name of this site is <1>Timeline</1>, which is a Web App with <3>timeline</3> as its core concept. Its frontend and backend are both developed by <5>me</5>, and open source on GitHub. It is relatively easy to deploy it on your own server, which is also one of my goals. Welcome to comment anything in GitHub repository.

credits.title: Credits
credits.content: Timeline is works standing on shoulders of gaints. Special appreciation for many open source projects listed below or not. Related licenses could be found in GitHub repository.
